----------------
description: This file provides instructions for YAML files in the repository.
applyTo: **/*.yaml, **/*.yml
----------------
- Use 2 spaces for indentation; do not use tabs.
- Maintain consistent key ordering for better readability.
- Use lowercase letters and hyphens (-) for key names.
- Enclose string values in double quotes ("") when they contain special characters.
- Use lists for multiple items, with each item on a new line preceded by a hyphen and a space.
